Aurorata· By Thomas Prujean, student of Gonvile and Caius Colledge in Cambridge. Prujean, Thomas, 1622 or 3-1662.
[88] p.
Printed for Hugh Perry neere Ivy Bridge in the Strand, London : 1644.
In verse. Signatures: A-E Fp4s. "Loves looking-glasse divine and humane" has separate dated title page; register is continuous. Thomason copy imperfect: significant show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

In verse. Signatures: A-E Fp4s. "Loves looking-glasse divine and humane" has separate dated title page; register is continuous. Thomason copy imperfect: significant show-through. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
Hugh Perry
